Replies.Reply: A horribly deformed figure--hunchback, misshapen head--sits on a stool in complete silhouette. This is RICK COOGAN.
Can you imagine it, Regis, Kathie Lee? One day I'm a hot young movie star, and the next day I'm a hideous mutant freak, covered with festering lesions.
Well, it's kinda long, but okay.
So, what kind of crap do you scumbags want me to peddle?
Fertilizer? Ricky Coogan does not do ads for hi-tech cow shit. I'm a star, got it, Hertz?
Rico, give these misguided clowns Tony Danza's phone number, and let's get the hell out of here.
Noxon? Wasn't that just banned?
But I heard that shit's lethal.
Santa "Flan?" What kind of shitty name for a country is that?
Wait a second--
Look, it sounds great, but--
Uh-huh.
Where the fuck is Ernie?
IT'S THE ERNIE! WOOF! WOOF!
Yeah, why?
NO!
Let's get the hell out of here!
Leave me alone, troll!
That was before I got an entertainment lawyer.
Don't cry, Stuey, I'm still good.
ALRIGHT!
In the bag.
AHHHHHHH!
You gonna eat your peanuts, Ernie?
Here we are Ernie, Santa Spam.
Give me a few hours.
Sure glad that wasn't our plane.
Wait a second...
Forget them. I got a better idea.
Hey, how'd you like to make a quick hundred bucks?
buried beneath rolls and rolls of bandages, making his way through the protesters on crutches. Ernie helps him along, nervously. As Rick spots Julie from behind, he hands the crutches over to Ernie.
Here.
Help! Ow! Give me back my crutches! You monster! Oh, the pain! The agony!
Thanks. Don't worry about me.
Josh. Josh Tavner.
Same here! You could ride with us.
Oh, he's okay. Have you ever heard of an idiot savant?
That's Ernie. Except for the savant part.
Ooooh, my pelvis.
Well, he's got a few problems.
Well, with a script that bad, Coogan deserves an Oscar for coming off as good as he did!
I mean, that's what I read.
You think Slater could improv like this? Make you believe he was an invalid!? Huh!?
Human worm...
Dog boy...
Hideous frog man.
Kind of like a family reunion for you, huh?
Real stupid.
Let's go. This place is dead.
Nah, you seem like a regular dumbshit old redneck to me.
Drop dead.
We're deeply honored. But no thanks.
And to think we could be in the limo with those stewardesses.
ARE YOU OUT OF YOUR MIND!?
Hey! You're not supposed to have that stuff!
Let me go, Skuggs, or else!
Yeah, that's me!
AAAAAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHRRRRGGGGGGG!
Huh?
AAaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaargh!
Oh God! This was my good side!
Great use of the space.
Ernie? Julie?
"Cool, a freak show. Let's check it out!"
"It's so real." Is this real enough for you? I'm friggin' Quasimodo!
Okay, here I come.
Yeah, well, you're no Mona Lisas yourself. You're lucky I've got a strong stomach!
Get away from me you, you...
No thanks. I don't plan on staying long. How many of you are there in here anyway?
Huh?
This is nuts. This is crazy...
Get away from me. Get away! I'm not like you. You hear me? I'm Ricky Coogan! I AM NOT A FREAK!
It was your fault, anyway. You wanted to see the freak show.
Ernie!
"So You're a Hideous Mutant Freak--
Forget it. Not me. I'm not like those other god-forsaken animals.
Yeah. Says you.
You're right.

Well that EES guy should rescue me any minute. Then it's straight to the plastic surgeon and back to sunny old L.A. I wonder how many of my beautiful, anatomically correct girlfriends will be waiting for me.
Thanks, Stuey.
AHH! A phantom troll!
No.
In your dreams! Now get lost, troll!
Arrrggg. I am Beast Boy. I will eat you. Arrrghh.
I can't do this shit!
Damn it! What's keeping those guys?
Well, let's see. I've been kidnapped, hideously disfigured, imprisoned with a bunch of mutant freaks, my rescue party is M.I.A., and this dialogue makes "Hey Dude Three" read like "Dr. Zhivago."
So?
I'll be right there.
Thank you Worm. I don't really know how I can repay you for this.
Ha-ha! Always the wit, eh Worm?

Now is the winter of our discontent, Made glorious summer by this son of York, But I that am not shaped for sportive tricks, Nor made to court an amorous looking glass, I, that am curtailed of this fair proportion, Cheated of feature by dissembling nature,  The audience is riveted. Even Spanish-speaking peasants are mouthing the words. Elijah, however, thumbs through his script, totally confused. The freaks watch through the bars from the wings--completely engrossed, especially Julie. Juan notices this and pulls her closer to him, but she pushes him away.
And that so lamely and unfashionable, That dogs bark at me as I halt by them.
I'm saved! Haha! You sorry mutants are gonna rot in this hole while I'm sipping mint juleps by the pool!
I mean, um, I hope you have room for all my friends, heh-heh.
What are you saying!?
EAT SHIT!
Hey. The Wheel. Mind if I sit in?
Look! I'm sorry for what happened at the show. Can't you just forget it?
You have an escape plan?
What's the matter with all of you?
Fine! I'll just come up with an escape plan of my own then.
I will!
Forget it! I don't need you, EES, or anybody else! I'll get out of here all by myself, you... you.,.
Damn.
Psst! Hey, you. Milkman!
Just the man I'm lookinq for. Be a pal, and give me a hand will ya?
Okay. Guess I'll just have to milk the world's biggest breasted woman all by myself. Sorry to bother you.
Ooohh... Milk me! Milk me now!
Shit.
Damn! This guy doesn't trust anybody!
AHHHH!
No thanks.
Well, okay.
Well, are you gonna torture me or kill me or something?
But I thought I scared everyone away.
Yeah, but she loves everything.
Look Skuggs--Elijah--I've been in show business all my life. The public does not want to see disgusting, depraved violent filth.
This is your big plan? A dozen milkmen? Isn't that a little unusual?
Fine then. Go ahead. Hope you like reggae, ya flea bitten bastard.
Ah, shit.
Look, you'll all be killed. You don't know about Elijah's giant Rasta eyeballs with machine guns...
It's suicide! I can't let you do it.
You know how men are. Besides, it was a pretty good looking squirrel.
Julie, compared to this, sex with Julia Roberts was a thankless chore.
The Laughing Man!
Holy shit!
Read this. I grabbed it from Skuggs' office.
After that.
Elijah's up to something big, and we have to stop him.
Mmmm. Jasmine.
Alright guys, listen up--
I haven't said anything yet.
Tomorrow night, at the show, I'll be turned into a homicidal monster and forced to kill you all. But we might have a chance if we act fast.
And I've got a plan.
If we can get into Elijah's lab, maybe we can--
Oh. Well--
Um, maybe--
Oh. Oh yeah. Well, see, what I was going to say was--
Right. Well, what about--
Well, actually, I was going to suggest we send away for sea monkeys, train them to fire guns, and make a break for it. But if you want to go with this other thing, I guess that's okay.
Hey, look at this!
They "Ooh" and "Ahh". The image switches to a snapshot of a FAT MIDDLE-AGED WOMAN.
C'mon Ernie, let's go.
Hurry!
Scrappy!
It's been ten years since you chased this ball into the sewer! I thought you were gone for good!
Listen Scrap. Go home. Get help.
Good boy! Now go!
You never know.
Keep your voice down, Ernie.
Oh.... Right.
Well, here it is--the control panel for Elijah's Freaking process.
You did it, Worm! Way to go!
Here, hold this.
Thanks.
Look, I've been a freak all my life.' I realize that now. Up there on that screen, humiliating myself for every fool with six bucks in his pocket--
Alright. It doesn't matter.
Look, I'm talking about the ultimate human sacrifice.
Hey! In case you haven't noticed, I'm about to commit a noble and selfless act here.
Oops.
Okay. Let's do what we came to do, and this time, no more screw ups.
No. Here goes.
We have to wait. There's no way to speed up the machine.
It's plugged up!
You go ahead. I'll catch up.
Go!
Paul saved our lives!
This is no time to lament over a cadaver! We've got to get moving, or we're history! Now c'mon!
I said enough! Okay, listen up, everybody. We cracked the code and made the ointment we need to bring Skuggs down for good.
But we left it in the lab.
But wait! I found some macaroons!
I don't believe it. What's Hertz doin' here?
So EES is in bed with Elijah C.
Cut the crap, Hertz.
Really?
AAARRGGGGHH!
Holy shit.
Oh no, not now, Stuey!
Hey. That's Elijah's lab!
Stuey! Are you really in the lab?
Stuey! Stuey, can you hear me?
I want you to try and escape. Get the cup from underneath the instrument table and bring it to me, okay?
Yeah, right. Get movin'.
Take the tape off your mouth, idiot! They didn't tie your hands!
Great! There's no time to waste.
What a geek.
Stuey got caught. There's no way to get the ointment before the show.

No. It won't be me. It's some inhuman monster Elijah used me to create. As for me, the real me, I'll always be your friend. Before I have to rip your heads off, I'd like to say goodbye to each of you.
Worm... I'll miss your brains, the smell of your pipe, and the funny way you always go on talking until everyone wants to strangle you.
Cowboy, I'll miss your good humor, your down-home wisdom, and of course, the frothy milkshakes were udderly delicious, heh-heh...
Bearded... Lady... I dunno.
Nosey, I never really liked you.
Frog Man, I think death is probably the best thing for you now.
Ernie... Julie... I have mixed feelings.
On one hand, I'll remember you as the best friend a jerk like me ever had, and a low down repulsive slimeball.
On the other hand, I really respect you, and more than that, I, uh, well, I wish we'd had the chance to boink.
Today I make the proudest boast a man can utter: "Ich bien ein Freak!"
Uh, I'm a freak.
Stuey! Where are you?!
Oh no!
Nahh.
Wait! Wait!
Nahh.
AHHHHRRRGGG!
starts to transform. FWOOP! His ears spring out into huge monster ears, kinda like in Pinocchio. FWAAP! His mouth grows into a massive, Big Daddy Roth style monster mouth.
And then...
Sorry.
Well, let's see, the other freaks were lined up in Elijah's sights, and I was about to shove a pipe through Stuey's skull, when all of a sudden, I heard a voice...
Raarrrrrrgh!
Maybe you'll feel this ...
What antidote?
If you ask me, you skimped on the coconut!
Scrappy!
Atta boy, Scrap!
Great. But how did you--
No! It can't be!
Exactly like you two, I swear.
Yes... Yes it is.
Stuey!
Thank God. You know, this adventure has taught me something.
When man starts impinging on the subtle perfection of the earth's natural order, the only thing he'll create is havoc.
Sounds like my wife when she misses a mudpack!
We'll be right back after this, folks.
And long! My God! It makes War and Peace sound like a warm up act!
It's fixed? Well, it's about time!
I'll say.
How 'bout it, folks. Let's hear it for Ricky Coogan!
That's just great. What a story.
Oh Regis! You're incorrigible! Ha-
Sorry to interrupt Rick, but you've been talking for almost ninety minutes, and we've just got to go to a commercial.
And now back to the exciting conclusion of Ricky Coogan's incredible story.
It was so exciting!
Can we bring out the other freaks now?
And he really looked like--?
Everything. Everything except shoes, of course. Hah hah...
Meaty Twig Beef Sticks.
Helmet Head hair spray.
Noxon 24 biogenetic neuro-
Rick. Wait! Only you can stand up to the radicals trying to keep Noxon from the struggling farmers whose very future depends on it.
Only in the U.S....and Europe.
Rick, Rick, Rick... You want proof? Fine. Just take a seat.
Meet the head of our South American research facility, Juan Valdez.
Whatever. He's worked with Noxon 24 every day for five years, and he's in fine shape. Aren't you, Juan?
Thank you, Valdez. That will be all.
Ricky, this is important. We're talking about a major threat to the EES image. How does 2 million dollars plus expenses sound?
I hear you. Make it five million--
Good, it's unanimous. Well, what do you say, Ricky? Are you EES's "Man in Santa Flan?"
Rick! Thank God I got to you in time!
Ricky, you have no idea how your misfortune has touched our hearts.
No.
No need to use codenames, Elijah.
He was asking questions about Coogan, causing trouble. We figured he was one of yours.
So, where were we?
Very impressive.
At EES, our plans for your Gene Machine include everything, except shoes that is. Ha-ha-ha.
We'd love to show you.
Bill, if you'd be so kind.
Ricky who?
Stuey is finally out the door. Of course, now they spot him.
After him!
turns to his EES cronies in the audience. He looks bored.
What a waste of twelve bucks.
stands in front of the a group of EES HARDHATS who are using forklifts to move the Tasty Freekz Machine towards the exit.
What we're saying is... get stuffed, yokel.
Bullshit! The Everything Except Shoes corporation releases no new products unless I give the order!
My name is George Ramirez.
Yes. I am fine. Me and my team in Santa Flan have--
It is named for the patron saint of creamy desserts... As I was saying, we've worked very closely with Noxon...
I personally supervised its development...
I performed rigorous scientific tests. No potential danger was left uninvestigated...
The environmentalists are crackpots, all of them.
It's ridiculous, I tell you.
My kids just loved you in "Hey Dude Three: The Final Countdown." We need more wholesome role models like you.
Mister Coogan, is this your bag?
Is this your kid?
Ladies! All I wanted was a manicure! Yah-ha-ha!
IT'S THE COOG!
Quick, down here.
Nah, you can have 'em.
It is?
Jesus! We better find the limo before these whale kissers chop us up and sell us for parts.
There it is.
Let's go, Rick. They're waitin'.
Coog, those hippies'll tear us apart.
He says the pants don't usually come off for less than two-fifty, but since you're so cute, he'll make an exception.
Mother Theresa. Glad to meet you.
Ow! Hey!
Hey Julie. You know I'm kind of an idea man myself. Like, let's say there's a nuclear war, and the only two people left are you and the Pope... Would you pork him?
But one thing's for sure. That Coogan guy sure is an asshole, huh?
So, do you like Swedish films?
Lighten up, Coog, could be a goof.
Yeah. Where are all the weirdos?
Hey! What the--
Yeah. We really must be--
What the heck. We'll see some pickled dog brains, maybe some pictures of women with, you know, added equipment.
What the hell, Coog, these people are weird, but they seem nice enough.
Ladies first!
If I were you, I would!
Wait a second. You're really gonna smear that stuff on us and mutate our body parts!?
Well... then could you give me a really big rodney?
Well, at least I'll never have to go far for a piece of tail.
Ouch! I was just trying to keep things light. Oh God! Why me!?
Over here, Coog.
Chill out, Coog. You're talking to the original tag team of ugly pukes. Step into the light.
ULP!
Call me old-fashioned, but I'll go with Paul Lynde.
look like a plate of rancid giblets. We're still pals, right?
Oh... Sorry, Coog. For a second there, I was a total man-hater.
Sorry.
Hey Julie, how many feminists does it take to screw in a light bulb?
Two. One to screw it in and one to ride my Rodney! Ha-ha-ha!
Hey, shouldn't you tell Rick about your big escape plan?
Well, excuse me for living.
You gotta admit, Coog, it's a helluva trick.
Yeah. Don't go off half-cocked.
I'm getting a bad feeling here.
God, I can't believe he left you for a squirrel. What a dick.
Not again.
Oh well, at least we'll get to try a new position.
I'll say! Almost punctured a kidney!
It says it's strong enough for a man!
Beaver World!?
But you need Noxon 24 to make the freaking sludge, and Elijah told us himself he's run out of it.
It's my Aunt Gladys!
And that's me at my bar mitzvah!
Wait, you gotta see the ones from sleep-away camp! They're hilarious!
Hey! Do you hear that?
Shit. I can't see a damn thing.
Don't push me, Coog. I got a real short fuse today. I'm cranky, bloated, got a wicked case of cramps. Don't ask why.
Hey! It's working!
If it does work, do you think there'll be enough left over to give me a monster size rodney?
Seven bucks.
Sure it does. They don't let you into the theater if you don't pay the price of the ticket.
Somebody's comin'! Hurry.
If it's your damn pudding, I'll ring your wormy neck.
No way! The skull cracker is an illegal move!
Atta' boy Coog!
Hey, ain't that somethin'?
Oh, like that wasn't totally predictable.
Rick! Rick! Look! I got a rare still from your high school production of The Glass Menagerie!
Rick! Wait up!
Rick! Remember the speech you gave at the Actors Forum for Social Justice!?
Rick! Rick! It says here Noxon's dangerous. Why are you lending your name to it? What's happened to you, Rick? You used to be good! And now... I just don't know...
on the wing, pressing his face up against the glass. He's holding up a publicity shot of Rick and screaming something we can't hear.
AHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH...
Hey, I'm okay!
OW!
Wow! I'm Ricky Coogan's soulmate!
Wait'll I tell the kids at school!
Once America sees what happened to Ricky, they'll probably send the whole FBI down to save him!
I'll probably win a Pulitzer prize for this scoop. And I'll dedicate it to Rick!
That's okay. I know the way.
"Freaky Deaky! Ricky Coogan's a mutant in South America! By Stuart S. Gluck."
That's me!
Sure I wrote the article. But--
No. You've got it all wrong. I don't know anything about that.
AHHHHH! STOP IT! OOOWWWWW!
No way. I'll never talk! I'm made of stone!
HELP! RICK! RIIIIIIIIIICCKKK!
Rick! Riiiicccck!
Rick? Is that you?
Well you're no Julio Iglesias yourself, mister.
Rick! Riiiick! Riii--
--iiiiiick!
Yes! I'm in the lab! I'm in the lab!
Mmm hmmm!
Mmmm mmmmm!
Mmm! Mmmmm!
I got the cup, Rick!
Yeah. But if I don't move, they won't see me.
Riiiick!
Rick! Over here!
Here I am, Rick!
AAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!
Rick! Rick!
Look! I found the real Regis and Kathie Lee!
No, this is just my lunch!
This is Regis and Kathie Lee.
Ladies and gentlemen, this is your captain speaking. To the right of the aircraft, you can see a great view of the Grand Canyon.
And to the left you can see a panic-
EES mustn't stay! Take your toxic crap away! EES mustn't stay!
Some of their signs read--"Say No to Noxon!", "Coogan Go Home", "EES is killing our Earth!", "Ricky Coogan Sucks Shit"
Are you okay? Let me help you!
Wow... My name's Julie.
Give me those, ape. Help him up.
Hey Josh, a busload of us are headed over to Maracas to protest Noxon 24 and pelt Ricky Coogan with cow shit.
Us? You're with him?
Sure.
Is this better?
I'll say! What a total piece of shit. Don't you think so, Josh?
And what a lousy actor! I mean can you believe that "Hey Dude" crap?
Well, he's no Christian Slater.
You don't even want to hear the truth about Noxon, do you, Coogan?
I mean, look, I'm not saying this stuff is going to turn anyone into a... a...
Right. A human worm. I mean, that's just stupid. The point is--
Yeah, or a dog boy. That's absurd.
Okay, okay. Now you're just being silly. Human suffering's just a big joke to you, huh? You are sick, Coogan!
Cool! A freak show! Let's check it out!
Isn't it great? It's so "real"...
I'm Julie. And you are...
We'd like to see your freak show.
Eeuuuwww...
Ahem. Hello.
Oh, just our luck...
The sideshow tradition has been misrepresented by the media. You don't traffic in human misery. You show society the part of itself it doesn't want to look at.
My God! He's using Noxon Twenty-
Wait a minute. Does this mean we're not going to see a show?
Go screw yourself!
NOOOOO!
Pig!
Mother always said there'd be days like this. And I thought she was nuts!
Are you alright?
What!? Oh sure, blame the woman.
revolting. After all, physical beauty is just a socially-enforced myth that we, uh, oh shit... ULPI  Julie turns away and pukes on the floor.
Kind of the "top dog."
Don't be an idiot.

All the freaks have gone through this anguish, Rick. At first, I was blinded by my anger. I admit it. I wanted to break your neck for getting me into this. But I got over it. Juan taught me to channel my anger for the common good.
I THOUGHT I TOLD YOU TO SHUT UP!
Here. Take it.
we're in cubicle eight. Maybe later you'll be ready to talk.
How many?
Oaf!
Juan's plan is really ingenious Rick. See, he figured out that--
Rick, wait.
This isn't one of your dumb movies, Coogan. Look, Juan's a good dog, a smart dog. I'll talk to him.
Come on. You heard the Beast Boy.
Oh Rick, you've touched a place in me no one has ever touched before.
But it's made for a woman!
Hey Rick. What's up?
"Tape Donahue... Renew Subscription to Beaver World..."
"Prepare demonstration for Laughing Man, receive five thousand barrels of Noxon." Five thousand barrels!?
Yes! Exactly! If they've been using Noxon 24 as a fertilizer here, the entire ecosystem must be soaked with it! All we need is a way to extract it from the vegetation, ideally into a liquid form.
Good thinking, Rick.
Wow!
Stooge!
I hate when you do that.
It's a dog!
Look, a wood floor.
PMS...
But how? You didn't even use the Noxon.
Hang on, Rick. Do you really think we should put this toxic glop on you? What if it doesn't work?
Sometimes seven fifty.
No kidding. When you consider money for parking, popcorn, drinks...
Here it comes.
Rick! Come on!
Oh, Rick...
Rick! It's finally over!
Well, now it really is over.
Oh, shut up.
Let's go fuck.
Another billboard. This one features the "Hidyous Frawg Man."
There are no weirdos here.
And you're lucky I don't BITE you!

Mutants, yes. Genetic nightmares, definitely. Children of Hell and twisted masses of living, breathing tormented flesh, certainly. But as for weirdos... not a one. Unless of course you count me! Ha ha ha!
police... How may I help-you?
And you come to me looking for weirdos?
Mr. Toad is my... assistant. As for the show, I'm afraid the next parade of deformity isn't until tomorrow night...
However! I do have a private exhibit in my shed you might enjoy.
Yes... Yesm I see...
AH-HA-HA-HA-HA-HA! HE-HE-HE! HA-
HA-HE-HE-HE! God I love the Family Circus! How do they do it day after day? It's amazing.
Well, I guess they do use the same joke over and over. I'm just a sucker for that little moffet's shenanigans, that's all.

But perhaps I should tell you a little more about what I do. You see, I not only exhibit freaks, I make them. Just like Michelangelo saw the angel in the stone, I look at a guy like Kevin Costner and see a giant peach grub who can fart the Blue Danube!
Am I crazy or is it hot in here?
Behold! The Tasty Freekz machine!
Oh? Well, I guess I'm not supposed to have these either!

I need only punch a few buttons on this magnificent device, and it gives me an easy-to-apply ointment that will mutate a perfect young body, bubble its skin, warp its bones and twist its guts into AN UNSPEAKABLY REPULSIVE, STOMACH-
Toad, fire up that machine, and let's turn these hapless asswipes into monstrosities!
AAAAHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHHH!
Now let's see. Who wants to get freaked first?
Hmmmm.
two birds with one stone... Yeah, it's pretty darn good, really...
Let 'er rip, Toad!
Correct.
I'm a mad scientist pal, not a miracle worker.
Gumby! Put that thing away!
Feast your eyes!
A mere party trick. But you, you're gonna be special.
You know her?
Ah, screw it. I'd never get anywhere with her. TOAD! FIRE UP THAT INFERNAL YOGURT MACHINE!
For years I've strived to create the ultimate monster. The first of a whole new generation of superfreaks! Now I've finally got you, the perfect subject--a real asshole! HA-HA-
Wait a minute. Aren't you the guy from "Hey Dude Three-The Beguiling?"
Replies.Didascalie: (he pauses and looks closer at Rick)

Replies.Reply: You were great in that picture! Oh well, I guess for the next one they'll have to get Christian Slater! HA-HA-HA!
This is Red Swan. May I speak to the Laughing Man?... Yes, I'll hold.
Laughing Man? Red Swan. I've done it! I found the perfect subject--
Well, I liked 'em.
Right... Yes... Yes, I see...
Geez, what a grouch.
Laughing Man? I have to go. What about the Noxon? Two days? Great, you can see everything then...
Wakey, wakey. Time to meet and greet the new you.
Still is if you ask me! Hell, even half-done, you'll be the star of the show tonight.
Welcome to your spacious accommodations.
I learned it all from Bob Vila.
Give it a rest, Bob!
One of these days I gotta put a shitter in there.
Alright, freaks! Get ready for the glamour! Get ready for the glitz!
It's grisly! It's revolting! It'll make you wish you were dead! And at just twelve bucks a head, you can bring all the kids!
Quiet, please.
Thank you. Ladies and gentlemen, you are about to witness a cavalcade of atrocities so horrific, I advise the more sensitive members of our audience to leave the premises.

Tonight I'm proud to announce the addition of several new monstrosities to the show, including our star attraction, the Beast Boy--an untamed and highly dangerous ghoul who's liable to go nuts and kill us all at the drop of a hat.
onstage.
And now a perennial favorite here at Freakland, ladies and gentlemen.
Puppetteering is an admirable skill in its own right! Give him his due!
They're going nuts for you, Beast Boy! You better go out there now!
Now that's entertainment.
seen in extreme close-up, watches the surveillance monitor.
Good work, Eye and Eye.
Now bring the Beast Boy to my, uh, den. Ha-ha-ha-ha!
Diet soda?
Fiddle Faddle?
You sure?
Torture my greatest creation ever!?
And when you ripped off that guy's head, I knew it was working like gangbusters!
Uh-huh. And then they told two friends, and they told two friends, and so on, and so on. Look at this.
Dear Mister Skuggs, I was shocked and disgusted when my grandson told me about the head-popping beast at your show. Please send me six tickets.
Dear Beast Boy, I used to like New Kids on The Block, but you're way cuter. My favorite ice cream is chocolate. Is it fun ripping people's heads off? I love you.
The Beast Boy is on a blood-letting spree, and Oscar is along for the ride!
That one's from Pat Collins!
Toad! That Fiddle Faddle is for guests only! You've had enough!
Oh, and I suppose Jake and the Fatman is just a fluke?
I'll get it.
On the other end of the line, we hear LAUGHING MAN's insane chuckle. Elijah's smooth smile fades. He turns his back to-
Yes... Right... Tomorrow...
Okay, Coogan. I'm finished with you for now.
But listen. I may not be "Mr.
I told you enough!
Bye-bye. And remember, try another escape, and I'll feed your balls to Toad.
That's a lot of milkmen on the same route. No wonder they fight.
runs out on his front porch in his nightclothes and screams down at the outhouse.
Styrofoam cup?
Aaargh! Damn buttered popcorn!
Bad for the environment.
Nice to see you in the flesh, Laughing Man.
Who's the troll?
I make freaks alright, but come on, fellas--this thing's pathetic.
Not only ugly, he's crazy too.
Gentlemen, I'm not going to bullshit you. I know my setup here at Freakland looks like small potatoes.

But thanks to your Noxon and my genius, tonight I will turn Ricky Coogan into a freak so hideous, it'll be enough to turn your stomach inside out, boil your brain in its own juice, and cause cold sores you thought had healed up to start buggin' you again.
It's the dawning of a new age for us all. Behold, Super Mega Freak World!
It's really somethin', huh?
We'll kick Disney's dead ass!
Ha-ha. Gee, I'd love to see your plans.
Hey! Hold on!
Secretaries? Worker drones?
This guy's good.
And now the moment you've all been waiting for. Ladies and gentlemen, meet the lucky young man who's about to be become the monster with the mostest! Here he is, the Beast Boy!
With this remarkable ointment of my own design, I will now turn this half-finished ghoul into the ultimate super freak, dedicated to evil!
Uh-oh, that kid looks pissed. EYE AND EYE! KILL HIM!
TOAD!
looks worried. He scoops up some "evil ointment".
Looks like it's time to roll out the big gun.
Sayonara, kiddo. Any last words?
Suit yourself.
Give him the skull cracker, ya big goon!
What the hell-!?
Replies.Didascalie: (he turns to Hertz and is STUNNED)

Replies.Reply: What are you saying!?
I figured I couldn't trust you corporate greaseballs!
Let me proudly introduce the latest in our product line, Noxon 25--now available in a convenient pump!
I think it's time EES branched out a little.
Now that's a really, really big shoe. Ha-ha-ha-ha! Hmmm, I think I'd like a pair of those!
Would you hurry up and waste the troll, please!? I got a lonely shoe over here!
Kill him! Kill him!
Cut the lovey-dovey bullshit, and start mutilating each other!
You think I made you strong? HA!
Ow! I think you crushed my spinal cord. I can't feel anything in my fingers.
Qait--if you kill me, you'll never find the antidote.
A time release serum--I baked it into a delicious batch of macaroons.
Come on, Coogan! Come oooon! You haven't got the guts to kill me!
AAAAAAAARRRRRRGGGGGHHHH!
You know you could expose those rustic beams and put in a skylight over one weekend, Elijah.
No problem. It's all here in my Beds and Bathrooms book, Elijah.
Notice the way I use an elliptical motion to chafe Stuey's buttocks.
Freak? Ha ha hahahaha!
I am Juan the Dog Boy, leader of the freaks.
Welcome to Hell, Rick. Shake?
First, I have a question for you, Ricardo. Who starred in the film "International Velvet?"
Well, perhaps we should ask the Worm!
Tell us, Worm, who starred in "International Velvet?"
Yes, Worm. But who was the star?
Olivia DeHavilland... Rick, do you agree or disagree?
Very good. It was Tatum O'Neill, now married to tennis star John McEnroe. Circle gets the square.
okay, JulieErnie, your turn. Who's it going to be?
Nosey the Nose Man!
Cowboy!
Sockhead!
The Human Torch!
Rosie the Pinhead!
The hideous Frog Man!
And of course, in the center square, Mr. Paul Lynde!
Well JulieErnie, who will it be?
You see, Rick? Just because we're freaks doesn't mean we can't have some fun, huh?
Hey. Mind your business.
So. Now you don't mind mixing with us--how did you say it--sorry mutants?
Listen, Beast Boy, the games are a simple diversion.
Beneath our twisted flesh we freaks cry out for freedom!
I figured out that our escape does not include the Beast Boy. No one may discuss the plan with him, understand?
Haha! I have spent a year studying this hellhole, devising the perfect escape. You think you'll just tango right out the door!? Ha!
Twelve milkmen is theoretically possible. Thirteen is silly.
And I can't let you stop us.
Squirrel!
Gotcha! Damn, it's about time!
Hey guys! Jeez! You look great!
Olivia DeHavilland.
Blast. O'Neill ... No talent ragamuffin...
You're mistaken, Rick. You are exactly like us. We were all normal healthy folk before we made the fateful mistake of visiting this hell hole at an off hour.
I was a professor of lacrophylogy--
At first, the transformation was fabulous. I truly understood the worm's ethos like never before.
You are one of us now, Rick.
Something's troubling you, my boy.
I think I know what you're going through. I too had an eating disorder. You see, I've always had a feverish obsession with pudding.
And when I won first prize, they never called me pudding-head again.
Don't you see? You must turn your hardship into inspiration! You're an actor, Rick! Your body is your instrument, and with it you must play your tragic symphony for all the world!
You could wipe my ass.
Damn.
Nosey, have I ever told you what a gifted artist you are?
Of course! Design a super freak of our own and manipulate the genetic code to make him destroy Elijah instead of us! Brilliant!
By God, it's so crazy it might just work!
Good Lord! It's the Lost City of Nodd!
It must be the lab! we've done it!
Good work, my boy. Now step aside.
Ah! You don't need Noxon to make Butterscotch pudding. I just wanted to test the machine's capabilities. Mmmm! Glorious! So creamy! Yum!
Don't forget a sitter for the children!
Don't you think we should make some more pudding first, as a test?
Preposterous... I have no neck.
The tunnel walls are about to collapse!
Just made it!
So, that's it then? We're all to die... And by your hand no less.
Shameless, maudlin--Baaa!
Ridiculous... Just because a man doesn't like macaroons...
Yayyy!
Yeah! Way to go Rick! Alright!
How ya' doin.
When I arrived here, I was nothing like I am now.
I was confused--a walking contradiction, so full of questions.

If your coloring is in the autumn range, like Maria's, try an earth tone eye makeup. Now I've done a lovely French braid on Maria, but I encourage everyone to experiment and use your imagination. The main thing is to just have fun with it.
Hey Rick, I thought you were gonna come up with your own escape plan?
But how do we get to the lab?
What do you smell?
Awwright!
I first came here as a tourist, looking for some fun...
Anyway, then Elijah turned me into a sock. That's it.
Sorry. I'm not much for stories.
Watch out, Hulk! He's gonna try the skull cracker!
is ringing those "tuned bells" and singing along.
Edelweiss, Edelweiss.
Gosh, if it wasn't for Rick, we'd all be dead!
We're done for! We're done for! I don't want to die! It's the end of the world! The apocalypse! Aahh!
Sorry. I'm not much for timing.
No! Can't you see we're digging our own graves!?
OUT OF MY WAY!
I... I... just... wanna...say...
Ah, forget it. I'm not much for dying.
eighteen-wheeler. He looks very much like he does now, except he has no lipstick or earrings.
I'll be waiting for you, Rick!
Seeing phantom trolls, Rick?
Sounds to me like you've developed a telepathic bond. Don't mean yer nuts or nuthin'. Heck, old Nosey, why he can smell the future. Lots of us freaks got E.S.P. And Sockhead, he's got E.S.P.N.
Shucks, Rick, you're lucky.
Shucksm Rick, it don't make sense to spurn your soulmate. I reckon that troll could help you if you just let him into your heart.
Right! The worm could dig a tunnel!
Golly! So that's why my milk comes out that funny green color! I thought the grass tasted funny!
Hi, Rick.
I reckon that troll could help you if you just let him into your heart... your heart... your heart...
Your heart... your heart... your heart...
Of course I'll print it! America needs to know! Burt! Give mister Gluck his fee and show him out.
Heh heh heh heh hehh heh.
Ha-ha-ha!
Ho-ho-hahahaha hee hee hoohaaa!
A-HA-HA-HAHA-HA-HA-HA!
Aha-hee-hee-ho-ho-har-har-har!
Wow, what a great model!
But look, this one's crooked.
Sorry.
C'mon, my granny could throw better than you!

The freaks mill around in the caged-in green room, guarded by Toad. Frogman, dressed in a magician's outfit over his wetsuit, holds an empty dove cage and searches the room, whistling for his missing dove. Nosey sneezes up a cloud of feathers. JulieErnie walk determinedly towards the adjacent Men's and Women's restrooms... BONK! They hit the wall between the two doors.
The Worm is still talking to Rick. We can hear the crowd screaming for him in the background.
EEEEOOOOOOOOOOOOOIIIIIEEEEEE...
He's got a hand under there!
It's a hoax!
The spotlight reveals Rick, centerstage, poised in Shakespearean garb. The crowd quiets down and focuses on Rick with great respect and awe. A truly dramatic silence.
If you're having trouble understanding Mr. Coogan's brilliant reading of this soliloquy from Richard the Third, please take advantage of the handy subtitles for the culturally illiterate.
AH-HA-HA-HA! WHAT A PUTZ!
Ahhh! Head for the hills before he gets all of us!
SHHH!
Rick, Rick, listen, I really love this new look you've come up with.
I'm saying you're ugly enough to burn the nosehairs off a dead nun.
AHHHHHH! HELP! LET US OUT OF HERE!
I'd like to buy a vowel.
Wow, giant Rasta eyeballs, just like Rick said.
I say we kill him.
I still say we kill him.
Way to go, Rick! How did you ever think of such a plan?
SOR-RY.
What a jerk!
Almost there.
But wait, I'm getting a whiff of things to come!
Blood.
And hot buttered popcorn!
Didn't know I did impressions, did ya?
Mission accomplished. They've got the Noxon, and they'll be in the lab within minutes.
What is it, kid?
Way to go, Paul!
I... buried... Paul.
Daed si luap.
Aoo...
Yaayyy!
Yeah... ?
Oooh no! I know you freaks.
Gee, I love eggnog!
Hey, what the--
with little arms and legs, wearing Jamaican Rasta hats and aiming smoking Uzi 9mms in the air. They aim their Uzis at Rick. One holds a walkie-talkie, the other holds a big spliff.
Rastafari.
RASTAFARI!
AAAGGGGHH!
billowy white bed amidst puffy clouds.
Rick and Julie kiss passionately. We're tight on them.
Rick! Do something! It's up to you, Rick! Pleeeeeeease!

Characters.Character: WOULD YOU TURN DOWN THAT GODDAMN

Replies.Reply: RACKET!?
Yap!
Yap!
Yap! Yap!
Yap!
Yap!
Boy, this is going like clockwork!
Peuw! Hey! Of all the... That really pisses me off!
What does today's businessman want?
In the factory, how 'bout a worker with twelve busy hands, no mouth to talk back, and no genitalia or digestive system to distract him from his work?
Sure! It's what we all dream of!

Well, with this Skuggs-based Noxon technology, it's not only possible, it's just the beginning! Of course, what happened to our expensive spokesman Ricky Coogan was an unfortunate coincidence, but profits from these new markets could total in the billions.
Ha-ha. I was just getting to that.
We'll impact every field.
creams, nosejobs in a bottle.
Look! The troll!
AAHHHH! WE'RE IN A ZOO!
Goddammit, kid! Would you sit down!?
What the hell!?
YOUR ASS IS MINE, SKUGGS!
Rick! Rick! Could you sign this!?
TIME TO DIE, TROLL!
flips Stuey onto the ground and starts stomping on him.
NOW I RIP FREAKS TO PIECES!
Ahem. At this point in time we at EES regret that we must leave this performance prematurely.
No! We're your friends!
You like cheese. You like being a man. That's why you like..
Macheesemo. Real cheese for real men. Now in a handy aluminum dispenser.
Freeze, FBI!
Thank heavens you brought him to justice, Rick. God only knows how far his sick plans would've gone.
Is nothing sacred?
Oh, my Lord!
Two pieces of deadmeat!
Looks like they took care of Skuggs, chief.
Hey chief, look at this!
Nice work, Ricky. You'll get a medal from the Vice President for this.
We've been following Skuggs for years. Scrappy just filled in some of the details.
Thought you killed me, huh?
Show's over, Ricky!
What the hell are you looking at?
I'm gonna drink your blood!
And that's my story.
That's better.
Okay! We got light!
Awwww!
Julie's had enough. She socks Ernie square on the jaw.
As the credits roll, and everybody continues to smile and wave at the cheering audience, Elijus and Elly Lee attack again. Ernie hands the gun to Stuey, who shoots them dead.
